prompts: Create a water-type Pokemon with a playful demeanor and unique aquatic features.
Generate a mythical creature that resembles a small blue fish with a long tail.
Show me a Pokemon that embodies the essence of the sea with vibrant colors.
Imagine a legendary Pokemon that can control water and has a charming personality.
Design a cute, tiny creature with a rounded body and delicate fins.
Give me a Pokemon that is gentle and friendly, perfect for companionship.
Make a whimsical aquatic Pokemon that has sparkling gold accents on its body.
